name: vanillagrid
description: A tiny dependency-free data grid for the web

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:ts && npm run build:css
scripts.build:css: cleancss -o dist/vanillagrid.min.css vanillagrid.css && terser vg-pivot-d3.js --compress --mangle --output dist/vg-pivot-d3.min.js && cleancss -o dist/vg-pivot-d3.min.css vg-pivot-d3.css
scripts.minify: terser vanillagrid.js --compress --mangle --output dist/vanillagrid.min.js && cleancss -o dist/vanillagrid.min.css vanillagrid.css && terser vg-pivot-d3.js --compress --mangle --output dist/vg-pivot-d3.min.js && cleancss -o dist/vg-pivot-d3.min.css vg-pivot-d3.css
